instruction: Describe the relationship between two characters from the novel you are reading.
output: In the novel I am reading, two characters share a special bond. They might not always see eye to eye, but they always look out for each other. They often go out of their way to help the other in times of need and provide emotional support. They also challenge each other to become better people, helping each other to learn and grow. They are always there for each other and their friendship has a strong foundation of trust and mutual respect.
